concept-wr.title: Utilities for vSwitch
concept-wr.shortdesc: You can query virtual switch (vSwitch) instances in HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade, and perform packet tracing on vSwitch interfaces.

conbody.p: US53369 topic addedIn HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade, an accelerated virtual switch (AVS) runs on each compute host, providing Layer 2 switching for the virtual machines instantiated on the host. Up to 254 ports are supported for each host; this total includes physical, guest, and host ports.
You can use the vshell utility to query the status of each vSwitch and collect performance statistics. You can use the vtrace utility to perform packet trace operations.
